ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel found
ygData.msgSnippet: I can actually think of a few limited (Bardic) uses for Eye of Zomm, tho I m a little distressed that it s on our top of the line armor.... Maybe like adding
ygData.messageBody:
I can actually think of a few limited (Bardic) uses for Eye of Zomm, tho I'm
a little distressed that it's on our top of the line armor.... Maybe like
adding the effect to a sword that doesn't have any effect at all would be a
better place for it...

One potential use: There's many times I'm the puller for the party... I
obviously can't provide mana song while out hunting... unless I'm hunting
with Eye of Zomm. :) Of course, the limited range, lack of track, and small
"chase" radiuses in RoK might make this less effective, but there are a
couple situations where it might work well.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony



> This looks kinda fake. If it isn't, what the heck is with that list of
races? And Eye of Zomm? I'd be
> laughing if I wasn't crying.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk
